Name: Assassin at Crimson Keep
About the game: Assassin at Crimson Keep is a short visual novel set in a dark, quasi-fantasy world. After a botched assassination attempt, you pursue the King into his lair known as the Crimson Keep. Your small choices can have great consequences, either for good or for evil. Key Features: Six (Mostly) Different Endings 15-30 minutes per run-through Small Choices Have Big Consequences Hand Drawn Art Original Music by Adrian James
